verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite <S%H5284><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Should not the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> be answered <S%H6030><s%>? and should a man <S%H376><s%> full of talk <S%H8193><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%>?
Should your lies <S%H907><s%> make <S%H2790><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> hold their peace <S%H2790><s%>? and when you mock <S%H3932><s%>, shall no man make you ashamed <S%H3637><s%>?
For you have said <S%H559><s%>, My teaching <S%H3948><s%> is pure <S%H2134><s%>, and I am clean <S%H1249><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> oh that <S%H5414><s%> God <S%H433><s%> would speak <S%H1696><s%>, and open <S%H6605><s%> his lips against you <S%H8193><s%>;

And that he would show <S%H5046><s%> you the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, that they are double <S%H3718><s%> to that which is <S%H8454><s%>! Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that God <S%H433><s%> exacts <S%H5382><s%> of you less than your iniquity deserves <S%H5771><s%>.
Can you by searching <S%H2714><s%> find out <S%H4672><s%> God <S%H433><s%>? can you find <S%H4672><s%> out the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> unto perfection <S%H8503><s%>?
It is as high <S%H1363><s%> as heaven <S%H8064><s%>; what can you do <S%H6466><s%>? deeper <S%H6013><s%> than hell <S%H7585><s%>; what can you know <S%H3045><s%>?
The measure <S%H4055><s%> there is longer <S%H752><s%> than the earth <S%H776><s%>, and broader <S%H7342><s%> than the sea <S%H3220><s%>.
If he cut off <S%H2498><s%>, and shut up <S%H5462><s%>, or gather together <S%H6950><s%>, then who can hinder him <S%H7725><s%>?
For he knows <S%H3045><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> men <S%H4962><s%>: he sees <S%H7200><s%> wickedness <S%H205><s%> also <S%H995><s%>; will he not then consider it?
For vain <S%H5014><s%> man <S%H376><s%> would be wise <S%H3823><s%>, though man <S%H120><s%> be born <S%H3205><s%> like a wild ass <S%H6501><s%>'s colt <S%H5895><s%>.
If you prepare <S%H3559><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%>, and stretch <S%H6566><s%> out your hands toward him <S%H3709><s%>;
If iniquity <S%H205><s%> be in your hand <S%H3027><s%>, put it far away <S%H7368><s%>, and let not wickedness <S%H5766><s%> live <S%H7931><s%> in your tabernacles <S%H168><s%>.
For then shall you lift up <S%H5375><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> without spot <S%H3971><s%>; Yes <S%H3332><s%>, you shall be stedfast, and shall not fear <S%H3372><s%>:
Because you shall forget <S%H7911><s%> your misery <S%H5999><s%>, and remember <S%H2142><s%> it as waters <S%H4325><s%> that pass away <S%H5674><s%>:
And your age <S%H2465><s%> shall be clearer <S%H6965><s%> than the noonday <S%H6672><s%>; you shall shine forth <S%H5774><s%>, you shall be as the morning <S%H1242><s%>.
And you shall be secure <S%H982><s%>, because there is <S%H3426><s%> hope <S%H8615><s%>; Yes <S%H2658><s%>, you shall dig about you <S%H7901><s%>, and you shall take your rest in safety <S%H983><s%>.
Also you shall lie down <S%H7257><s%>, and none shall make you afraid <S%H2729><s%>; Yes <S%H7227><s%>, many shall make suit <S%H2470><s%> unto you <S%H6440><s%>.

But the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>, and they shall not escape <S%H6><s%>, and their hope <S%H8615><s%> shall be as the giving up <S%H4646><s%> of the Spirit <S%H5315><s%>.
